title: Fixed Width Font Issue
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm trying to design a label using Futura Fixed-Width.

I'm not entirely sure if this looks OK or if I should change the tracking to make it look better (I'm not a pro designer!).

Any suggestions on how this text could be spaced better or is it fine??

Thanks for helping out.

All the best..

Jason

author: jbm15

comments.content: I would actually avoid using a fixed-width font in a context like this. I would adjust the kerning (manually if necessary) to make the perceived distance between adjacent letters consistent.
Will do. Thanks so much for your help!
